nodes.text: Martin Skov is a director and animator who worked on the LEGO Star Wars projects LEGO Star Wars: Droid Tales, LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles, and LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures He directed the 2016 Freemaker Adventures episodes "The Mines of Graballa", "Crossing Paths", and "Return of the Kyber Saber". Skov has also worked on other projects including The Ugly Duckling and Me! and Lego Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu.
